title: munjAneyeddu
sahitya:
munjAneyeddu gOvinda enni


anupallavi

  nammananjipa duritavu dUravenni


caraNam 1    asura samhAriyenni dasha shira vairiyenni shishuvu moreyiDalu rakSisidanenni 
asuranaraNyadoLu bhasmava mADalu vasudhEyoL nATyavanADidanenni
    caraNam 2    baliya bEDidanenni celuva vAmananenni lalaneya abhimAna kAidanenni 
kaliyugadali banda krSNAvatAranenni sale pANDu sutarannu pAlisidanenni
    caraNam 3    karuNAkaranenni kapaTa nATakanenni karirAjananu kAida krSNanenni 
paripariyindali bhaktara salahuva varada purandara viTTalanenni
